Articles.Content: Hey people, whats up!? Friction here from Serbia. I've been playing KSP from time to time, and thought why not join the forums eh? I don't know much about the game and so, and still can't dock or make good maneuvers but it doesn't matter Cheers!

Welcome to the forums! You'll love it here, this is the nicest gaming community that I've ever been a part of. And as to the docking and maneuvers... Trial and error, lots and lots of error at least, that's how I did it. But there are also plenty of people on here who will teach you everything you need to know about everything... So feel free to ask anything!

Cheers!
Oh btw whats up with the avatars and uploading screenshots? Is there a post limit on them?

I don't think there's an upload limit on screenshots... Just don't put a million in one post, it takes up a ton of space and annoys people sometimes. Other than that, I don't think anything is limited.

, one of my favourite scenes.
Oh btw whats up with the avatars and uploading screenshots? Is there a post limit on them?

The forum doesn't host users' screenshots as far as I know (bandwidth concerns), I'd recommend hosting them on imgur.com and linking to them. Avatars must be 64x64 and profile images can be 100x100.
